Name: GameWelcome
Message: Welcome {playerName}.  The veil between arcades grows thin.  You must find the way to the high score.  But beware of the rats!

Name: GameRespawn
Message: Get the high score.  But beware of the rats!

Name: ArcadeTableWon
Message: You defeated the barrier! Now you can ascend the stairs!

Name: QuestCommunicate
Message: Hello {playerName}, I see that you have learned to communicate.
